title: Update Clear Choice Solutions phone number and email

requirements.text: Update the centralized contact configuration in `frontend/src/config/contact.ts` to use the correct phone number and email address provided by the user, so all places that read `CONTACT_CONFIG` (site header, footer, and Service Areas contact block) display and link to the updated values.

quotes:
Please put the proper phone number and email address. 
Number - 703 864 3078
Email - solutionsclearchoice@gmail.com

acceptanceCriteria: `CONTACT_CONFIG.phone.tel` is set to a tel:-friendly E.164 value for the same number: "+17038643078" so `getTelHref()` resolves to `tel:+17038643078`.
`CONTACT_CONFIG.email.address` is set to: "solutionsclearchoice@gmail.com" so `getMailtoHref()` resolves to `mailto:solutionsclearchoice@gmail.com`.

The updated phone number and email appear on the public marketing site anywhere `CONTACT_CONFIG` is rendered (including header, footer, and the Service Areas section contact block), with clickable tel: and mailto: links.

constraints: Do not edit any files under `frontend/src/hooks/` listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep contact details centralized in `frontend/src/config/contact.ts` (do not hardcode phone/email into individual components).
nonGoals: Adding a new dedicated contact section or changing the site layout beyond updating the configured phone/email values.
Changing backend logic or CRM behavior.
